data.eml:eml: New species of plume moths of the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) from southern Africa. 7

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kovtunovich, Vasily, Ustjuzhanin, Petr (2015): New species of plume moths of the genus Agdistis Hübner, 1825 (Lepidoptera: Pterophoridae: Agdistinae) from southern Africa. 7. Zootaxa 4033 (4): 555-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4033.4.6
